93  ObstacleSegment(int id, const Vertex &left, const Vertex &right) : left(left), right(right), id(id) {dir = right-left; dir = dir/dir.EuclideanNorm();}

142 inline bool Node::operator == (const Node &another) const
143 {
144  return i == another.i && j == another.j;
145 }
146 
147 inline bool Node::operator != (const Node &other) const
148 {
149  return i != other.i || j != other.j;

155 inline bool ObstacleSegment::operator ==(const ObstacleSegment &another) const
156 {
157  return (this->id == another.id);
158 }

161 {

164  left = obj.left;
165  right = obj.right;

172 inline float Point::ScalarProduct(const Point &another) const
173 {
174  return this->x * another.x + this->y * another.y;
175 }
176 
177 
178 inline Point Point::operator - (const Point &another) const
179 {
180  return {this->x - another.x, this->y - another.y};
181 }
182 
183 
184 inline Point Point::operator + (const Point &another) const
185 {
186  return {this->x + another.x, this->y + another.y};
187 }
188 
189 
190 inline Point Point::operator * (float k) const
191 {
192  return {this->x * k, this->y * k};
193 }
194 
195 
196 inline Point Point::operator /(float k) const
197 {
198  const float invK = 1.0f / k;
199  return {this->x * invK, this->y * invK};
200 }
201 
202 
203 inline float Point::SquaredEuclideanNorm() const
204 {
205  return this->ScalarProduct(*this);
206 }
207 
208 
209 inline float Point::EuclideanNorm() const
210 {
211  return std::sqrt(this->ScalarProduct(*this));
212 }
213 
214 
215 inline float Point::Det(Point another) const
216 {
217  return (this->x * another.y - this->y * another.x);
218 }
219 
220 
221 inline bool Point::operator ==(const Point &another) const
222 {
223  return (this->x == another.x) && (this->y == another.y);
224 }
225 
226 
227 inline Point Point::operator-() const
228 {
229  return Point(-this->x, -this->y);
230 }
231 
232 
233 inline Point& Point::operator = (const Point &obj)
234 {
235  x = obj.x;
236  y = obj.y;
237  return *this;
238 }

241 inline Vertex& Vertex::operator = (const Vertex &obj)
242 {
243  Point::operator=(obj);
244  convex = obj.convex;
245  return *this;
246 }
